bug.author: soumochak83
bug.summary: Unable to deploy Kubeflow on Openshift 3.11
bug.description: Platform details: Openshift OKD 3.11 Kubeflow version: 0.5 I'm trying to deploy Kubeflow using the documentation - <denchmark-link:https://v0-5.kubeflow.org/docs/started/getting-started-k8s/>https://v0-5.kubeflow.org/docs/started/getting-started-k8s/</denchmark-link> . However seeing this error while trying to run the command - kfctl init ${KFAPP} kfctl init ${KFAPP} FATA[0000] could not download repo to cache Error (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: couldn't download kubeflow repo <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/tarball/v0.5.1?archive=tar.gz>https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/tarball/v0.5.1?archive=tar.gz</denchmark-link> Error Error opening a gzip reader for /tmp/getter164338714/archive: EOF filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:304" Please help to fix this issue.
